message:
I want a good library for reading bar code using windows phone app. especially Code 128 and Code 39.
I tried many open source libraries but non of them was reliable.
So if you have personal experience with any library doing this please mention it.

data.message:
No sure If you have tried it or not, but I've used ZXing in my Android applications and it worked great (at least for  EAN_128 didn't try with Code 39 ).

It has bindings for several languages one of them is for the .NET platform.

https://github.com/zxing/zxing/
I tried the .Net implementation but it is not working for all cases
